com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKMapViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKMapViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class SKMapViewHolder
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    Class that holds the map surface view and other helper views.

    Steps:

    1. Initialize the SKMaps framework with the steps described at SKMaps.

    2. Inflate or create a SKMapViewHolder.

    Version:
    2.5

        Important Has to be called when overriding onResume method from the activity that uses the SKMapViewHolder.

      • getMapSurfaceView

        public SKMapSurfaceView getMapSurfaceView()
        Returns the map surface view. SKMapSurfaceView is available only after SKMapSurfaceListener.onSurfaceCreated(SKMapViewHolder) callback is received.
        Returns:
        a SKMapSurfaceView object, null if the map surface view was not created yet.

      • setMapSurfaceListener

        public void setMapSurfaceListener(SKMapSurfaceListener mapSurfaceListener)
        Sets the listener for the map.
        Parameters:

      • setScaleViewMargins

        protected void setScaleViewMargins(int horizontalPadding,
                       int verticalPadding,
                       int rule1,
                       int rule2)
        Set the alignment rules, horizontal and vertical padding in pixels for positioning the scale view.
        Default:ALIGN_PARENT_LEFT and ALIGN_PARENT_TOP .
        Default value: margin is 10 dip
        Parameters:
        horizontalPadding -
        verticalPadding -
        rule1 -
        rule2 -

        Parameters:

      • setScaleViewEnabled

        public void setScaleViewEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the scale view.
        Parameters:
        enabled - if true the map scale view will be shown.

      • isScaleViewEnabled

        public boolean isScaleViewEnabled()
        Returns if the map scale view is shown.
        Returns:
        true if the map scale view is shown , false otherwise.
